sys_app_application.description: Scenario: Employees of organization wish to order different types of Computers from a Custom Service Catalog and wish to report back on various incidents or issues related to software or hardware on a computer. The purpose of the application is to demonstrate ability to build custom applications from scratch with various tables linked together, build user interfaces, one separate for the Administrators in Next Generation UI, and the various departments having access to only Service Portal. Access Controls ensure that various personnel can only view what they are supposed to view, edit, create and delete. Create Multiple Knowledge Bases for the various departments that individual departments can then maintain.
sys_app_application.title: Dream Team Company
